short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add speech-to-text functionality to Claude.ai chats using free Groq API

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: As of now users have to create an account with Groq and use it for having a speech to text functionality embedded for their claude chats. We will soon be releasing a hosted version of the same without having to go through Groq
